item.description:
Presenter: Dr. Allan Hughes--

Humility has always been a core teaching of every faith tradition. Humility means being in harmony with ourselves and others. It is the knowledge that each of us has been created for a purpose, and there’s something to learn from everyone. Humility is not weakness–it is an inner strength which we can access through meditation.
The call-in number is: 1-712-432-3900. When prompted, enter your access code: 1617505 followed by the # sign.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: The Heart's Cry (Teleseminar)
